title: The antidote to apathy
description: Local politics -- schools, zoning, council elections -- hit us where we live. So why don't more of us actually get involved? Is it apathy? Dave Meslin says no. He identifies 7 barriers that keep us from taking part in our communities, even when we truly care.
author: Dave Meslin
keywords: TED, talks, TEDx, collaboration, community, culture, global issues, politics
